title: The Hercules Text
description: The classic first-contact science fiction novel that launched the career of Jack McDevitt, the national bestselling author of Coming Home.From a remote corner of the galaxy a message is being sent. The continuous beats of a pulsar have become odd, irregular…artificial. It can only be a code.Frantically, a research team struggles to decipher the alien communication. And what the scientists discover is destined to shake the foundations of empires around this world—from Wall Street to the Vatican
author: Jack McDevitt
